name: tm11
effect: Teaches Sunny Day to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sunny Day to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: BubbleBeam)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. This also weakens the power of Water-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. This also weakens the power of Water-type moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.
